trans-unit.source: Connect to LOB systems from a BizTalk Services Project
trans-unit.target: Connect to LOB systems from a BizTalk Services Project

trans-unit.source: Connect to the <token>lobconnect</token>.
trans-unit.target: Connect to the <token>lobconnect</token>.

trans-unit.source: The application developer uses the development environment to build the <token>msgflow_proj</token> application and deploy to the <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: The application developer uses the development environment to build the <token>msgflow_proj</token> application and deploy to the <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: When <token>lobconnect</token> is installed, the components used to create the <token>af_integration</token> application with LOB connectivity are available.
trans-unit.target: When <token>lobconnect</token> is installed, the components used to create the <token>af_integration</token> application with LOB connectivity are available.

trans-unit.source: To configure the Development environment, see to <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure Service Bus EAI and EDI Labs - April 2012</link>
trans-unit.target: To configure the Development environment, see to <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure Service Bus EAI and EDI Labs - April 2012</link>

trans-unit.source: Server Explorer
trans-unit.target: Server Explorer

trans-unit.source: Server Explorer in <token>vsprvs</token> is used to create the <token>lobtarget</token>s.
trans-unit.target: Server Explorer in <token>vsprvs</token> is used to create the <token>lobtarget</token>s.

trans-unit.source: Server Explorer is available on the <legacyBold>View</legacyBold> menu in your <token>msgflow_proj</token> in <token>vsprvs</token>.
trans-unit.target: Server Explorer is available on the <legacyBold>View</legacyBold> menu in your <token>msgflow_proj</token> in <token>vsprvs</token>.

trans-unit.source: <token>vsprvs</token> must be opened with Administrative privileges to create and develop with the LOB adapters.
trans-unit.target: <token>vsprvs</token> must be opened with Administrative privileges to create and develop with the LOB adapters.

trans-unit.source: Add your Management URL
trans-unit.target: Add your Management URL

trans-unit.source: To create a <token>lobtarget</token>, connect to your Runtime server:
trans-unit.target: To create a <token>lobtarget</token>, connect to your Runtime server:

trans-unit.source: Create the <token>msgflow_proj</token> in <token>vsprvs</token>.
trans-unit.target: Create the <token>msgflow_proj</token> in <token>vsprvs</token>.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="03421690-817a-45a8-8492-c9cb98484102" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to Create a Message Flow Project</link> lists the steps.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="03421690-817a-45a8-8492-c9cb98484102" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to Create a Message Flow Project</link> lists the steps.

trans-unit.source: In <legacyBold>Server Explorer</legacyBold>, right-click <embeddedLabel><token>lobconnect</token></embeddedLabel>, and select <legacyBold>Add BizTalk Adapter Service</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: In <legacyBold>Server Explorer</legacyBold>, right-click <embeddedLabel><token>lobconnect</token></embeddedLabel>, and select <legacyBold>Add BizTalk Adapter Service</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: This prompts for the <token>lobconnect</token> Management URL:
trans-unit.target: This prompts for the <token>lobconnect</token> Management URL:

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> Management URL is path to the ManagementService.svc WCF service hosted in IIS.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> Management URL is path to the ManagementService.svc WCF service hosted in IIS.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="355e839a-c2ca-48e2-bc2e-e3cd1ad32466" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Runtime: ServiceBus Connect Service Runtime Components</link> provides more information on the <token>lobconnect</token> components within IIS.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="355e839a-c2ca-48e2-bc2e-e3cd1ad32466" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Runtime: ServiceBus Connect Service Runtime Components</link> provides more information on the <token>lobconnect</token> components within IIS.

trans-unit.source: If the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime is installed locally with the default settings, enter:
trans-unit.target: If the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime is installed locally with the default settings, enter:

trans-unit.source: http://localhost:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/
trans-unit.target: http://localhost:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/

trans-unit.source: Or
trans-unit.target: Or

trans-unit.source: https://localhost:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/
trans-unit.target: https://localhost:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/

trans-unit.source: If the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime is installed remotely with the default settings, enter:
trans-unit.target: If the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime is installed remotely with the default settings, enter:

trans-unit.source: http://<legacyItalic>ServerName</legacyItalic>:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/
trans-unit.target: http://<legacyItalic>ServerName</legacyItalic>:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/

trans-unit.source: Or
trans-unit.target: Or

trans-unit.source: https://<legacyItalic>ServerName</legacyItalic>:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/
trans-unit.target: https://<legacyItalic>ServerName</legacyItalic>:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/

trans-unit.source: During the <token>lobconnect</token> installation, you choose whether to allow SSL connections.
trans-unit.target: During the <token>lobconnect</token> installation, you choose whether to allow SSL connections.

trans-unit.source: The runtime URL automatically defaults to HTTP or HTTPS depending on your SSL choice.
trans-unit.target: The runtime URL automatically defaults to HTTP or HTTPS depending on your SSL choice.

trans-unit.source: In the following scenarios, you may need to change from the default settings:
trans-unit.target: In the following scenarios, you may need to change from the default settings:

trans-unit.source: You installed the <token>lobconnect</token> with the no SSL option.
trans-unit.target: You installed the <token>lobconnect</token> with the no SSL option.

trans-unit.source: From another computer, you connect to the Runtime URL.
trans-unit.target: From another computer, you connect to the Runtime URL.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, you must enter HTTP for the Runtime URL:
trans-unit.target: In this scenario, you must enter HTTP for the Runtime URL:

trans-unit.source: http://<legacyItalic>ServerName</legacyItalic>:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/
trans-unit.target: http://<legacyItalic>ServerName</legacyItalic>:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/

trans-unit.source: You installed the <token>lobconnect</token> locally and allowed SSL connections.
trans-unit.target: You installed the <token>lobconnect</token> locally and allowed SSL connections.

trans-unit.source: You reinstall the <token>lobconnect</token> and don’t allow SSL connections.
trans-unit.target: You reinstall the <token>lobconnect</token> and don’t allow SSL connections.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, you must enter HTTP for the Runtime URL:
trans-unit.target: In this scenario, you must enter HTTP for the Runtime URL:

trans-unit.source: http://localhost:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/
trans-unit.target: http://localhost:8080/BAService/ManagementService.svc/

trans-unit.source: The web site and BAService application in IIS use Windows Authentication.
trans-unit.target: The web site and BAService application in IIS use Windows Authentication.

trans-unit.source: If you enter the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of this IIS server, you are prompted for authentication credentials when browsing.
trans-unit.target: If you enter the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of this IIS server, you are prompted for authentication credentials when browsing.

trans-unit.source: Select <legacyBold>OK</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Select <legacyBold>OK</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: This adds the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime Server in the Server Explorer and the LOB Types installed with the <token>bap</token>.
trans-unit.target: This adds the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime Server in the Server Explorer and the LOB Types installed with the <token>bap</token>.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the SSL and certificate options chosen during the <token>lobconnect</token> setup, you may get a <embeddedLabel>server certificate for the website may not be valid</embeddedLabel> error.
trans-unit.target: Depending on the SSL and certificate options chosen during the <token>lobconnect</token> setup, you may get a <embeddedLabel>server certificate for the website may not be valid</embeddedLabel> error.

trans-unit.source: This typically happens if the certification authority is not trusted.
trans-unit.target: This typically happens if the certification authority is not trusted.

trans-unit.source: If you chose to create a new self-signed certificate, this error is expected.
trans-unit.target: If you chose to create a new self-signed certificate, this error is expected.

trans-unit.source: Proceed to the website.
trans-unit.target: Proceed to the website.

trans-unit.source: Expand the server URL and <embeddedLabel>LOB Types</embeddedLabel> to see the individual LOB adapters installed with the <token>bap</token>.
trans-unit.target: Expand the server URL and <embeddedLabel>LOB Types</embeddedLabel> to see the individual LOB adapters installed with the <token>bap</token>.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, enter the <token>ac2</token> namespace and issuer name/issuer key values.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, enter the <token>ac2</token> namespace and issuer name/issuer key values.

trans-unit.source: The <token>ac2</token> values are listed in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=211879</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: The <token>ac2</token> values are listed in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=211879</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Select your BizTalk Service and then select <legacyBold>Connection Information</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Select your BizTalk Service and then select <legacyBold>Connection Information</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: You can copy and paste these values.
trans-unit.target: You can copy and paste these values.

trans-unit.source: To configure the individual <token>lobtarget</token>s, refer to the Line-of-Business (LOB) system:
trans-unit.target: To configure the individual <token>lobtarget</token>s, refer to the Line-of-Business (LOB) system:
